resources.name: users

resources.name: Rent&Play
resources.description:
## Description
This is the documentation for the [Rent&Play API](http://api.rentandplay.com.br), a **backend application constructed to be used exclusively for our React web app** [Rent&Play Platform](https://api.rentandplay.com.br)!

This documentation has two environments - **Production and Development**. You can switch between environments using the select box in the top left corner of the page.

If you are curious, you can **access our GitHubs and see how we built this magnifique applications**: [**Backend Repository**](https://github.com/henriquemarioto/rent-play-api) **and** [**Frontend Repository**](https://github.com/henriquemarioto/rent-play) üòâ

## Errors

Here are the **most common errors** that can occur when using the API.

### Token
Some errors that can happen when **try to access routes that require authentication**.

#### **403 Forbidden**  - Not enough permission
```json
{
	"detail": "You do not have permission to perform this action."
}
```

#### **401 Unauthorized** - Missing token
```json
{
	"detail": "Authentication credentials were not provided."
}
```

#### **401 Unauthorized** - Invalid token
```json
{
	"detail": "Invalid token."
}
```

### User
Some errors that can happen when **try to access routes that works only with a active user (via PK or token)**.

#### **403 Forbidden** - User inactive or deleted.
```json
{
	"detail": "User inactive or deleted."
}
```

### Primary Key
Some errors that can happen when **try to access routes that need or use primary keys**.

#### **404 Not Found** - Not found
```json
{
	"detail": "Not found."
}
```

### Pagination
Some errors that can happen when **try to access routes that works with pagination**.

#### **404 Not Found** - Invalid page
```json
{
	"detail": "Invalid page."
}
```

resources.name: List User Detail
resources.description:
Retrieve a specific user account.

```response
{
	"nickname": "guilherme",
	"first_name": "Guilherme",
	"last_name": "Preveda",
	"cellphone": "499125678",
	"email": "guilherme@rentandplay.com.br",
	"wallet": "0.00"
}
```

resources.name: List Users
resources.description:
List all user accounts.

```response
{
	"count": 2,
	"next": null,

	"results": [
		{
			"id": "362dec48-bcd0-41bc-8b06-f2fcdc34bd8b",
			"nickname": "guiz√£o",
			"first_name": "Prelherme",
			"last_name": "Guiveda",
			"cellphone": "49987654321",
			"email": "prelherme@rentandplay.com.br"
		},
		{
			"id": "5b8690c3-ee57-4334-a581-a3d6bbdd252a",
			"nickname": "gui",
			"first_name": "Guilherme",
			"last_name": "Preveda",
			"cellphone": "49912345678",
			"email": "guilherme@rentandplay.com.br"
		}
	]
}
```

resources.name: List Newest Users
resources.description:
List the specified number of user accounts ordered by `date_joined`.

```response
{
	"count": 1,
	"next": null,
	"previous": null,
	"results": [
		{
			"id": "362dec48-bcd0-41bc-8b06-f2fcdc34bd8b",
			"nickname": "guiz√£o",
			"first_name": "Prelherme",
			"last_name": "Guiveda",
			"cellphone": "49987654321",
			"email": "prelherme@rentandplay.com.br"
		}
	]
}
```

resources.name: Withdraw
resources.description:
Withdraw wallet funds from a user account.

```response:200
{
	"nickname": "guilherme",
	"first_name": "Guilherme",
	"last_name": "Preveda",
	"cellphone": "499125678",
	"email": "guilherme@rentandplay.com.br",
	"wallet": "25.00"
}
```

```response:403
{
	"detail": "Wallet not enough funds!"
}
```
